text.__SUMMARY__:
Lonchocarpus trifolius is a species of legume in the family Fabaceae.
It is found only in Honduras.
text.Sources: Nelson, C. (1998). "Lonchocarpus trifolius". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T30704A9571811. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T30704A9571811.en. Retrieved 19 December 2017.
